languages.text: "У них ведь в руках целые дубинки, а у вас — всего лишь источник энергии, питающей жизнь корабля! Чего им с вами считаться?! Так вам и надо, малохольные!" {n}Мерзкий вопль отравой растекается по вспотевшим лицам, что придвигаются все ближе.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "У них ведь в руках целые дубинки, а у вас — всего лишь источник энергии, питающей жизнь корабля! Чего им с вами считаться?! Так вам и надо, малохольные!" {n}Мерзкий вопль отравой растекается по вспотевшим лицам, что придвигаются все ближе.{/n}

languages.text: "They have the almighty baton. All you have is the source of the power that feeds the whole ship. Why shouldn't they take you for granted? It serves you right, you cowards!" {n}His ugly shriek spills like venom upon the sweating faces as they slowly draw closer and closer.{/n}
languages.original_text: "У них ведь в руках целые дубинки, а у вас — всего лишь источник энергии, питающей жизнь корабля! Чего им с вами считаться?! Так вам и надо, малохольные!" {n}Мерзкий вопль отравой растекается по вспотевшим лицам, что придвигаются все ближе.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "They have the almighty baton. All you have is the source of the power that feeds the whole ship. Why should they take you for granted? It serves you right, you cowards!" {n}His ugly shriek spills like venom upon the sweating faces as they slowly draw closer and closer.{/n}

"They got clubs, and all you have is the source of Motive Power that gives life to the ship. Why should they take you for granted?! Serves you right, you numbskulls!" {n}A vile shriek spreads across the sweating faces that draw closer and closer like poison.{/n}

"They have clubs. All you have is the source of Motive Power that gives life to the ship. Why should they take you for granted? It serves you right, you cowards!" {n}An ugly shriek rises like venom from the sweating faces as they slowly draw closer and closer.{/n}

"They have clubs. All you have is the source of Motive Power that gives life to the ship. Why should they take you for granted? It serves you right, you cowards!" {n}An ugly shriek rises like venom from the sweating faces as they slowly draw closer and closer.{/n}

"They have the almighty baton. All you have is the source of the power that feeds the whole ship. Why shouldn't they take you for granted? It serves you right, you cowards!" {n}His ugly shriek spills like venom upon the sweating faces as they slowly draw closer and closer.{/n}

"They have the almighty baton. All you have is the source of the power that feeds the whole ship. Why should they take you for granted? It serves you right, you cowards!" {n}His ugly shriek spills like venom upon the sweating faces as they slowly draw closer and closer.{/n}

"They have the almighty baton. All you have is the source of the power that feeds the whole ship. Why should they take you for granted? It serves you right, you cowards!" {n}His ugly shriek spills like venom upon the sweating faces as they slowly draw closer and closer.{/n}

languages.text: "Sie haben den allmächtigen Schlagstock. Ihr habt nur die Quelle der Kraft, die das gesamte Schiff speist. Warum sollten sie Euch ernst nehmen? Geschieht Euch recht, Ihr Feiglinge!" {n}Sein hässlicher Schrei ergießt sich wie Gift über die schwitzenden Gesichter, die langsam näher kommen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "They have the almighty baton. All you have is the source of the power that feeds the whole ship. Why shouldn't they take you for granted? It serves you right, you cowards!" {n}His ugly shriek spills like venom upon the sweating faces as they slowly draw closer and closer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Sie haben den allmächtigen Schlagstock. Ihr habt nur die Quelle der Kraft, die das gesamte Schiff speist. Warum sollten sie Euch ernst nehmen? Geschieht Euch recht, Ihr Feiglinge!" {n}Sein hässlicher Schrei ergießt sich wie Gift über die schwitzenden Gesichter, die langsam näher kommen.{/n}

languages.text: «Ellos poseen la todopoderosa porra. Vosotros no tenéis más que la fuente de la energía que da vida a la nave. ¿Por qué no os valoran? ¡Porque es lo que os merecéis, cobardes!». {n}Sus desagradables gritos se extienden como veneno por los rostros sudorosos que se acercan inexorablemente.{/n}
languages.original_text: "They have the almighty baton. All you have is the source of the power that feeds the whole ship. Why shouldn't they take you for granted? It serves you right, you cowards!" {n}His ugly shriek spills like venom upon the sweating faces as they slowly draw closer and closer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Ellos poseen la todopoderosa porra. Vosotros no tenéis más que la fuente de la energía que da vida a la nave. ¿Por qué no os valoran? ¡Porque es lo que os merecéis, cobardes!». {n}Sus desagradables gritos se extienden como veneno por los rostros sudorosos que se acercan inexorablemente.{/n}

languages.text: 「奴らは全能のバトンを持つ。お前の手にあるのは、船全体に電力を供給する電源だけ。彼らがお前を当たり前のように扱わないのはなぜだろうな？いい気味だ、この腑抜け！」{n}男の醜い叫び声が汗ばんだ顔に毒のようにぶちまけられて、どんどん近づいてくる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "They have the almighty baton. All you have is the source of the power that feeds the whole ship. Why shouldn't they take you for granted? It serves you right, you cowards!" {n}His ugly shriek spills like venom upon the sweating faces as they slowly draw closer and closer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「奴らは全能のバトンを持つ。お前の手にあるのは、船に命を注ぐ動力の源だけ。彼らがお前を当たり前のように扱うのはなぜだろうな？いい気味だ、この腑抜け！」{n}男の醜い叫び声が汗ばんだ顔に毒のようにぶちまけられて、どんどん近づいてくる。{/n}
「奴らは全能のバトンを持つ。お前の手にあるのは、船全体に電力を供給する電源だけ。彼らがお前を当たり前のように扱うのはなぜだろうな？いい気味だ、この腑抜け！」{n}男の醜い叫び声が汗ばんだ顔に毒のようにぶちまけられて、どんどん近づいてくる。{/n}

languages.text: “虽然他们的警棍确实很厉害，可整艘飞船的力量之源就在你们手中！他们凭什么不敢这么对待你们？不就是因为你们活该吗！你们这群孬种！”{n}他丑陋的尖叫声仿佛毒液一般，泼溅在那些满是汗渍的脸上。人群慢慢靠了过来。{/n}
languages.original_text: "They have the almighty baton. All you have is the source of the power that feeds the whole ship. Why shouldn't they take you for granted? It serves you right, you cowards!" {n}His ugly shriek spills like venom upon the sweating faces as they slowly draw closer and closer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “虽然他们的警棍确实很厉害，可你们手里明明还有源力！这艘飞船的能量之源！他们凭什么敢这么对待你们？不就是因为你们活该吗！你们这群孬种！”{n}他丑陋的尖叫声仿佛毒液一般，泼溅在那些满是汗渍的脸上。人群慢慢靠了过来。{/n}

languages.text: « Ils ont la matraque devant laquelle vous tremblez. Tout ce que vous avez, c'est la source de puissance qui donne vie au vaisseau. Pourquoi ne devraient-ils pas vous tenir pour acquis ? Vous n'avez que ce que vous méritez, bande de lâches ! » {n}Son horrible cri se répand comme du venin sur les visages en sueur qui se rapprochent peu à peu.{/n}
languages.original_text: "They have the almighty baton. All you have is the source of the power that feeds the whole ship. Why shouldn't they take you for granted? It serves you right, you cowards!" {n}His ugly shriek spills like venom upon the sweating faces as they slowly draw closer and closer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Ils ont la matraque devant laquelle vous tremblez. Tout ce que vous avez, c'est la source de puissance qui donne vie au vaisseau. Pourquoi ne devraient-ils pas vous tenir pour acquis ? Vous n'avez que ce que vous méritez, bande de lâches ! » {n}Son horrible cri se répand comme du venin sur les visages en sueur qui se rapprochent peu à peu.{/n}

« Ils ont la matraque devant laquelle vous tremblez. Tout ce que vous avez est la source de la puissance qui alimente le vaisseau tout entier. Pourquoi devraient-ils vous tenir pour acquis ? Vous n'avez que ce que vous méritez, bande de lâches ! » {n}Son horrible cri se répand comme du venin sur les visages en sueur qui se rapprochent peu à peu.{/n}

languages.text: "Ellerinde kudretli coplarıyla geziyorlar. Sizse tüm gemiyi besleyen gücün kaynağını elinizde tutuyorsunuz. Neden sizi hafife almasınlar? Hak ettiğinizi buldunuz işte korkaklar!" {n}Kulak tırmalayan feryadı, yavaşça daha da yaklaşan terli yüzlere zehir misali saçılıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "They have the almighty baton. All you have is the source of the power that feeds the whole ship. Why shouldn't they take you for granted? It serves you right, you cowards!" {n}His ugly shriek spills like venom upon the sweating faces as they slowly draw closer and closer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ellerinde kudretli coplarıyla geziyorlar. Sizse tüm gemiyi besleyen gücün kaynağını elinizde tutuyorsunuz. Neden sizi hafife alsınlar? Hak ettiğinizi buldunuz işte korkaklar!" {n}Kulak tırmalayan feryadı, yavaşça daha da yaklaşan terli yüzlere zehir misali saçılıyor.{/n}

"Ellerinde kudretli coplarıyla geziyorlar. Sizse tüm gemiyi besleyen gücün kaynağını elinizde tutuyorsunuz. Neden sizi hafife almasınlar? Hak ettiğinizi buldunuz işte korkaklar!" {n}Kulak tırmalayan feryadı, yavaşça daha da yaklaşan terli yüzlere zehir misali saçılıyor.{/n}
